refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The <sgraph; tool draw a graph in &infile; using a graphical user interface. If &infile; is not supplied the tool starts without a drawing. The interface consists of two parts. In the left part the drawing area and in the right part the options panel. Information about the current draw are available in the upper right part. Information about the drawing area size, the node currently selected and the file currently opened are available on the status bar.

Apart from basic draw, <sgraph; provides the following additional functionalities:
Nodes can be dragged and dropped by the left click.
Graphs layout can be optimize thanks to an algorithm. This is accessible from the Draw menu or the button on the right panel. Algorithm parameters can be modified on the right panel.
Nodes can be fixed by the right click. Nodes fixed can still be dragged and dropped but the optimize algorithm can not move such nodes.
A layout can be export to a PostScript or a LaTeX file.
